content.title: Terms and Conditions Acceptance
content.description: To continue using SendMe, you must review and accept our updated terms and conditions of use.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is fundamental to us. We process your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable local laws. The information collected is used exclusively to provide our services and improve your experience.

usage.title: Platform Usage Terms
usage.content: By accessing SendMe, you commit to using the platform ethically and responsibly. Misuse, transmission of malicious content, or any activity that compromises the security of the system or other users is prohibited.

data.title: Data Processing and Storage
data.content: Your data is securely stored on certified servers. We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, or improper disclosure.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: SendMe strives to maintain a reliable service, however, we do not guarantee uninterrupted service availability. Our liability is limited to the terms established in this agreement.
